name: Potion Sella
description:
Hello, potion seller. These travellers are going into battle and want your strongest potions.

Platform around your shop to get your patrons their requests before time runs out. Get their order right or get fired!

Keyboard:
WASD to move, SPACE to jump, E to pick up and throw potions.

Xbox Controller: 
Left stick to move, A to jump, X to pick up and throw potions.
